summary: The module supplies test utilities for the Feast Python SDK, including pytest fixtures for configuring temporary feature store environments, a mock provider implementation that simulates Feast entities, feature services, and retrieval jobs, and an in‑memory registry store that mimics the Feast registry protobuf. These components enable the test suite to run integration and unit tests without requiring real external services.
business_intent: To streamline and isolate testing of Feast functionality by providing lightweight, configurable fixtures and mock objects that replace real offline/online stores and registry back‑ends, thereby improving test reliability and speed.
